# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) waiting for source items
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) working
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) not connected
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) empty
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) with full output
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668) not plugged into the electric network

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) empty
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) working
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5) working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities with no fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel before attempting to use them
- Check the status of burner entities regularly to avoid fuel depletion

### Errors when using entities with no ingredients
- Ensure that entities have sufficient ingredients before attempting to use them
- Check the status of entities regularly to avoid ingredient depletion

### Errors when using entities that are not connected
- Ensure that entities are properly connected before attempting to use them
- Check the status of entities regularly to avoid connection issues

### Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that entities are properly plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them
- Check the status of entities regularly to avoid electric network issues

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
